sources.name: Parquetchap9
sources.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~>  Parquetchap9

typeProperties.script:
section Section1;
shared Parquetchap9 = let
  AdfDoc = Web.Contents("https://ngadfsa.blob.core.windows.net/output/datalake/HandyCandy.parquet?sv=2018-03-28&sig=zKXqEQ1NCEhrM2kP3bWGLhvaqEPSI7czC%2F54UCpKvrk%3D&spr=https&se=2021-08-07T14%3A39%3A33Z&srt=sco&ss=bf&sp=rwl"),
  Parquet = Parquet.Document(AdfDoc)
in
  Parquet;
shared UserQuery = let
  Source = Parquetchap9,
  #"Removed columns" = Table.RemoveColumns(Source, {"TransactionId", "StoreId"}),
  #"Inserted parsed date" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns", "Parse", each Date.From(DateTimeZone.From([TransactionDate])), type date),
  #"Removed columns 1" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Inserted parsed date", {"Parse"}),
  #"Inserted parsed date 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Removed columns 1", "Parse", each Date.From(DateTimeZone.From([TransactionDate])), type date),
  #"Inserted start of month" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted parsed date 1", "Start of month", each Date.StartOfMonth([Parse]), type date),
  #"Added custom" = Table.AddColumn(#"Inserted start of month", "EndOfPreviousMonth", each Date.AddDays([Parse], -Date.Day([Parse]))),
  #"Added custom 1" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added custom", "SalesMonth", each Date.AddDays([EndOfPreviousMonth], 1)),
  #"Added custom 2" = Table.AddColumn(#"Added custom 1", "ItemCount", each 1),
  #"Removed columns 2" = Table.RemoveColumns(#"Added custom 2", {"TransactionDate"}),
  #"Grouped rows" = Table.Group(#"Removed columns 2", {"Start of month", "Product"}, {{"SalesValueUSD", each List.Sum([Price]), type nullable number}, {"UnitSold", each List.Sum([ItemCount]), type any}}),
  #"Added custom 3" = Table.AddColumn(#"Grouped rows", "Retailer", each "Handy Candy")
in
  #"Added custom 3";
